title: COVID-19 spurs calls to reduce traffic in Toronto hospitals - Global News
description: COVID-19 spurs calls to reduce traffic in Toronto hospitals Global News FUREY: It seems the public health system really is working in Canada – for now Toronto Sun Risk of coronavirus remains low - Chirico The North Bay Nugget Toronto man who returned from Swi…
content: With the number of positive cases of COVID continuing to grow especially in the Toronto region preparations are underway to quell the possibility of infection spread within health facilities Canadas first positive case of COVID saw the patient atten chars
